works.description: While LA graffiti artist Retna has been commissioned by VistaJet to paint the tail of the Bombardier Global Express XRS, famous Italian sculptor, painter and printmaker Mimmo Paladino has become the first person to turn a private jet into a work of art. Paladino has painted entirely a Piaggio P.180 Avanti II aircraft, which is being exhibited at the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II in Milan. Christened the “Cacciatore di Stelle” (Star Hunter), the painted plane will be shown to the public in famous shopping center through April 28.
